level_abl.description: The ABL value to use when use_level_abl is true (dB).
level_abl.title: Level Abl

use_level_abl.description: Indicates whether the level_abl should be used (true) or not (false).
use_level_abl.title: Use Level Abl

change_every_trial.description: Indicates whether the ABL should change every trial (true) or not (false).
change_every_trial.title: Change Every Trial

value.description: The minimum correct answer ratio required to advance to the next block (if use_performance is true).
value.title: Value

use_performance.description: Indicates whether there is a minimum performance requirement to advance to the next block.
use_performance.title: Use Performance

iti_light.description: Indicates whether the box LED should turn of when the new trial is ready (true) or not (false).
iti_light.title: Iti Light

poke_light.description: Indicates whether the central poke LED should turn of when the new trial is ready (true) or not (false).
poke_light.title: Poke Light

fixation_light.description: Indicates whether the central poke LED should blink during fixation time (true) or not (false).
fixation_light.title: Fixation Light

penalty_light.description: Indicates whether the box LED should blink during penalty times (true) or not (false).
penalty_light.title: Penalty Light

opto_exp_mean.description: The mean value of the random part of the optogenetics onset time (ms), which follows an exponential distribution.
opto_exp_mean.title: Opto Exp Mean

sound_exp_mean.description: The mean value of the random part of the sound onset time (ms), which follows an exponential distribution.
sound_exp_mean.title: Sound Exp Mean

step_size.description: The separation between two consecutive |ILD| values.
step_size.title: Step Size

num_steps.description: The number of |ILD| values. The final array will contain 2 * num_steps elements to account for both the positive and the negative ILD values.
num_steps.title: Num Steps

use_log.description: Indicates whether to use logarithmic steps between consecutive ILD values.
use_log.title: Use Log

can_reset.description: Indicates whether the ITI partially resets if the animal tries to poke in the CNP before it ends.
can_reset.title: Can Reset

level_id.description: The ID number of the training level.
level_id.title: Level Id

trials_per_block.description: The number of trials that a block of the current level has.
trials_per_block.title: Trials Per Block

iti.description: Contains the parameters related to the Inter-trial Interval.

max_wait.description: The maximum allowed time to start the trial (s).
max_wait.title: Max Wait

fixation_time.description: Contains parameters related to the fixation time.

reaction_time.description: Contains parameters related to the reaction time.

penalty_times.description: Contains the penalty times for different ocasions.

critical_performance.description: Contains the critical performance for the animal to progress to the next level and whether this feature is used or not.

trial_repetition.description: Contains the conditions for which a certain trial should be repeated.

speakers.description: Indicates whether the animal is using headphones (true) or box speakers (false). At the moment, this parameter doesn't modify the behavior of the task. Perhaps in the future, it might be possible to input the calibration curves of both the box speakers and the headphones so that this parameter switches to the correct calibration curves.
speakers.title: Speakers

cues.description: The parameters that control the use (or not) of visual cues during the task.

incorrect.description: The penalty time to be applied when the animal answers incorrectly.
incorrect.title: Incorrect

abort.description: The penalty time to be applied when the animal aborts a trial (except if it's a fixation abort).
abort.title: Abort

fixation_abort.description: The penalty time to be applied in case of a fixation abort.
fixation_abort.title: Fixation Abort

turn_sound_off.description: Indicates whether the sound should stop playing when the animal leaves the central poke.
turn_sound_off.title: Turn Sound Off

use_max_rt.description: Indicates whether there is a maximum reaction time (true) or not (false).
use_max_rt.title: Use Max Rt

repeat_errors.description: Indicates whether the stimulus is repeated after incorrect responses.
repeat_errors.title: Repeat Errors

repeat_aborts.description: Indicates whether the stimulus is repeated after aborts.
repeat_aborts.title: Repeat Aborts

levels.description: The list containing the parameters to be used for each training level.
levels.title: Levels
